rule: The text must be crafted artistically while ensuring precise imagery is conveyed.
input: Dancers whirl under cathedral alcoves, shadows spinning elegant crescents, melody breathing life into centuries-old stone.
output: Whirling dancers cast enchanting shadows beneath ancient cathedral arches as the ethereal melody of a chamber orchestra brings to life the stone’s storied past, evoking a sense of timelessly elegant ballet in this twilight hour.
complianceText:

The background is the setting of "ancient cathedral arches," supplemented with the ambiance set by "the ethereal melody of a chamber orchestra." The description concludes by evoking a "sense of timelessly elegant ballet," fulfilling the requirement to convey a feeling.
